fields.comment: if something other than 0 or 1, will only update_every_x_frames
fields.name: update_every_x_frame

fields.comment: if true, will send message Message_MaterialAreaCheckerFailed if the material doesn't exist. If false, will send a message Message_MaterialAreaCheckerSuccess if the aabb is full of material and material2
fields.name: look_for_failure

fields.comment: aabb offset, we check that this aabb contains only material
fields.name: area_aabb

fields.comment: String name of material that we check that the aabb contains
fields.name: material

fields.comment: String name of material2 that we check that the aabb contains
fields.name: material2

fields.comment: If > 0, and look_for_failure=0, will send message if material count exceeds this number of cells
fields.name: count_min

fields.comment: if 1, and look_for_failure=0, will always check the whole area for cells
fields.name: always_check_fullness

fields.comment: will kill this entity after sending the message
fields.name: kill_after_message

fields.comment: keeps track of how often we've checked
fields.name: mLastFrameChecked
